addBootnodes(string[]).details: Adds multiple bootnodes to the list

params.newBootnodes: Array of bootnode strings to add

returns._0: The address of the current bootnode manager

clearBootnodes().details: Clears all bootnodes from the list

currentStage().details: Returns the current stage number within the round

getBootnodesCount().details: Returns the number of registered bootnodes

getEoa(string[]).details: Retrieves the EOA addresses associated with multiple peer IDs

params.peerIds: Array of peer IDs to look up

returns._0: Array of EOA addresses associated with the peer IDs

getPeerId(address[]).details: Retrieves the peer IDs associated with multiple EOA addresses

params.eoas: Array of EOA addresses to look up

returns._0: Array of peer IDs associated with the EOA addresses

getPeerVoteCount(uint256,string).details: Gets the vote count for a specific peer ID in a round

returns._0: The number of votes received by the peer ID in that round

getRoundWinners(uint256).details: Gets the winners for a specific round

returns._0: Array of winner peer IDs for that round (empty array if no winners set)

getTotalWins(string).details: Gets the total number of wins for a peer ID

returns._0: The total number of wins for the peer ID

getVoterVoteCount(address).details: Gets the number of times a voter has voted

returns._0: The number of times the voter has voted

getVoterVotes(uint256,address).details: Gets the votes for a specific round from a specific voter

returns._0: Array of peer IDs that the voter voted for

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerPeer(string).details: Registers a peer's ID and associates it with the sender's address

removeBootnode(uint256).details: Removes a bootnode at the specified index

params.index: The index of the bootnode to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newManager: The address of the new bootnode manager

setStageCount(uint256).details: Sets the total number of stages in a round

params.newUpdater: The address of the new stage updater

stageCount().details: Returns the total number of stages in a round

returns._0: The address of the current stage updater

submitWinners(uint256,string[]).details: Submits a list of winners for a specific round

params.roundNumber: The round number for which to submit the winners
params.winners: The list of peer IDs that should win

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

uniqueVotedPeers().details: Gets the total number of unique peers that have been voted on

returns._0: The number of unique peers that have received votes

uniqueVoters().details: Gets the total number of unique voters who have participated

updateStageAndRound().details: Updates the current stage and round

returns._0: The current round and stage after any updates

voterLeaderboard(uint256,uint256).details: Gets a slice of the voter leaderboard

returns.voters: Array of addresses sorted by number of votes (descending)

winnerLeaderboard(uint256,uint256).details: Gets a slice of the leaderboard

returns.peerIds: Array of peer IDs sorted by number of wins (descending)

addBootnodes(string[]).notice: Only callable by the bootnode manager

clearBootnodes().notice: Only callable by the bootnode manager

removeBootnode(uint256).notice: Only callable by the bootnode manager

setBootnodeManager(address).notice: Only callable by the contract owner

setStageUpdater(address).notice: Only callable by the contract owner

updateStageAndRound().notice: Only callable by the stage updater
